page.title: 09Fashions today
page.content: We wear lots of different kinds of clothes today.In the{summer our school {uniform}for the girls is blue gingham dresses and the boys wear grey or white shirts, grey shorts and gold ties.In the{winter}girls wear white blouses, gold ties, grey skirts and royal blue jumpers.The boys wear grey,blue or white shirts and grey shorts, royal blue jumpers and gold ties. { Out of school}I wear jeans, track suits, shorts and tee-shirts.On the Isle of Wight,because it is not a city, we wear casual clothes. When{adults}go to work they wear different clothes.When my Mum goes to work, as a radiographer, she wears a white coat. My Dad works in an office and he wears a suit.
